caption.enter: $t(pin:createAccess.captionShort) will be required each time you open $t(common:appName).
caption.confirm: To confirm your PIN, re-enter the same code.

deleteAccess.caption: Enter PIN to disable.
deleteAccess.biometrics: Removing the PIN will also disable Biometrics.

biometrics.caption: يرجى المصادقة باستخدام FaceID أو ميزة بيومترية أخرى.

use.ios: Or use FaceID or fingerprint to access wallet.
use.android: Or use your phone's biometric features to access wallet.
